name: Girl's Lovecast (mikamiga) (mikamiga) (mikamiga) (mikamiga)
description:
Summary

Girls try their best and defeat darkness! An epic action-adventure through time and space, in which three best friends uncover a sinister plot and defend the Earth. Explore unique locales, exorcise demon-infested buildings, and take on engaging main quests and side-quests in this story-rich RPG.



Credits
  • Art, music, and game by mikamiga
  • "You Can Count On Me" written by mikamiga with a guitar performance by Hugh Harsher.
  • All sound effects obtained from freesound.org

Magical girl, magical girls
